name: KILLBOARD
description:
Killboard - Defend the worlds last billboard with your life, despite its ineffective marketing

Features

  • The game features a variety of weapons and by that I mean three.
  • The game has randomized billboards, so there's a near infinite amount of dad jokes to be seen.
  • The game automatically switches through weapons as you kill enemies, so you'll need to switch up your play style to stay alive.
